snippet.title: I picked a fight with the school sissy ... and lost
snippet.content: I RODE my pushbike to school on day one of Grade 1 at Eudlo Primary School. It was a mile and a bit and I was just six years old. I remember riding into the schoolyard and all the kids on the veranda waving at me. There were only 50 kids at the school. On day one, I had a fight - my very first day at school. I put a kid called David Johnson's head through the fence and wrapped the wire around his neck. So day one before lunch, I'm in the principal's office getting a lecture about the cane and what can happen to kids who fight. I never got into too much trouble after that. I don't know what happened to David Johnson. I think he joined the Navy. By Grade 3, I was a bit of a bully and decided to have a fight with the school sissy, who was also the teacher's son and I despised him immensely. I decided to fight him one day and got bashed up by the school sissy so I decided in Grade 3 that being a bully wasn't my game and I never got into another fight after that - from Grade 3 right through to Grade 12.
